## Source: ossf-package-analysis (062d38bd257a1bd651ffbda171e77c28cb87094f3245a4c6afc40e25393aafd0)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'consumerweb-captcha' @ 99.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
